column5: OK this may be the last one for 2011---See how bored I get??  Called it Freeze! Frosty  24 x 36
Looks good! I like it, lol... I bet if I showed my fiance, she'd wanna buy it in a heart beat!
Wow!  Fantastic work yet again!  Love it!
Thanks Guys--a fun l'il painting takin me back  I know --because I've met them----new age parents are not big on toy guns---but we were
Talent like this blows me away. You capture not just "images" but illicit emotion with your paintings. I'm a fan for sure!
Looks great!  If there a specific location or general geographical area that you base your outdoor scenery on? Is it by design or reactionary?
Thanks  I've lived from eastern Ontario to Inuvik in NWT and points in between  I use compilations of that group
Some good brushing in that one Terrence
Very cool...  Sometimes a snowman is the only other cowboy available...
thats an amazing piece. Great job!
Thanks FNA--hope your feelin better soon
Nice work once again Bushart. Always a enjoy your posts of your art.
Thanks Live2fish----It gives a few second distraction from our hectic days
